# MamboLite {{PHASE}} Release {{TAG}}

Thank you for using MamboLite. This release includes:

- Executables: GUI and CLI for Windows
- Docs: SOW (PDF) and README updates
- Starter data: lookups, sample CSV, SMTP template

What’s new

- See CHANGELOG.md for full details.

Notes

- If SmartScreen prompts on first run, click More info -> Run anyway.
- Corporate environments may block SMTP ports — see README Troubleshooting.
- Outlook email option requires Outlook desktop + pywin32.
